q: CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.'' Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a`` tremendous leader'' whose contributions exceeded all expectations. There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done, Page said. Although he tried to debunk the idea, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinised companies.

At the press conference, Stephen Elop outlined how the Microsoft partnership is good for Nokia. Then Stephen Elop delivered the understatement of 2011. We believe this partnership is also good for Microsoft. Let's assume that over the next three years Nokia's Symbian operating system largely gets replaced by Windows Phone 7.
